entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-11-23
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Cannot reference MAUI-Blazor project from another MAUI-Blazor project on iOS #3536
  • Entry's Integer Keyboard #3534
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets are not in NUPKG #3533
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • Get xplat element from native view #3530
  • Maui deploy on Android corrupted System #3528
  • NuGet Package Update causes issue compiling for non-windows debugging #3527
  • WPF app with BlazorWebView fails to compile the Razor components #3526
  • Label text disappears in template app #3524
  • xamarin simulator Failed to install XXX. the app directory does not exists #3523
  • Android: SQLConnection.open Android: A connection was successfully established with the server, but then an error occurred during the pre-login handshake. (provider: TCP Provider, error: 35 - An internal exception was caught) #3522
  • Using a StackLayout with AndExpand causes some sort of layout loop/invalidation/re-add #3519
    6.0.200-preview.11

Closed

  • [BUG] MAUI Blazor App uses MAUI Control in webview #3531
  • [Enhancement] Rework LogListener to use new loggers #883
  • [Bug] Impossible to enforce nullable ref warning as errors. #1796
  • WPF/WinForms Blazor Desktop need to override WebViewManager to use static web assets #2252

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix Modal Appearing/Disappearing #3535
  • BlazorWebView WPF/WinForms build targets need to go into NUPKG #3532
    area/blazor 🕸️
  • Update Essentials Screenshot API, capture native frames. #3529
    partner/ui-tools, area/essentials 🍞
  • Trigger frame events when the frame changes #3521
    area/layout 🔲, 6.0.200-preview.11

Merged

  • [Core,Controls] Remove legacy Log and use ILogger #3401
    area/hosting 🧩
  • Several fixes and changes to the dispatchers #3453
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Add extension to add an IView to a GridLayout at specific column/row #3484
    area/layout 🔲
  • Modifed XAML Source Generator to emit MemberNotNull attributes for named XAML controls #3497
    area/Xaml </>
  • Set the correct current page when popping #3515
  • Workaround #3514 #3516

Updated

  • FlyoutView Handler Android #3513
    area/shell 🐢
  • [Core] make Microsoft.Maui.dll trimmable #3249
  • [iOS, Windows, Android] Button border properties #3411
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮
  • Introduce IVisualDiagnosticsOverlay #3351
    partner/ui-tools, 6.0.200-preview.11
  • Provide a Date? so that Date can have a null value for UI elements to make it easier when user does not select a date #2306
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨
  • Allow to use string to define StrokeShape in XAML #3256
    area/Xaml </>, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement touch events in GraphicsView #3261
    t/enhancement ☀️, area/drawing ✏️
  • Implement GoBack, GoForward and Reload methods in WebViewHandler #3316
    area/controls 🎮
  • Init Essentials #3345
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
  • Essentials: Port xamarin/Essentials#1846 #2605
    area/essentials 🍞, community ✨
